channel.title: Abouts on Mili's Blog

item.title: Why this website?
About me
item.description: I’m Mili, a sophomore Computer Engineering student. I’m interested in creating things that make life easier. Furthermore, I’m a fan of free software (free as in freedom) and I’m trying to reach my dream of contributing to the free software community. I use Arch GNU/Linux as my daily driver and I also use dwm as my window manager. Switching to GNU/Linux has been one of the best decisions I’ve ever made.
